text: Any service that operates or is provided at night is a night service. It may also refer to: * Night service (public transport), a public transport service that runs at night * Night service (telephony), a feature of a telephone system for business * Isha prayer, the night-time daily prayer recited by practising Muslims * Vigil, a period of purposeful sleeplessness, an occasion for devotional watching, or an observance
title: Night service
